abstract: “Life is all about being in the right place at the right time, and getting the opportunity to show your stuff. So many great and talented people never get that opportunity.”
snippet: “Life is all about being in the right place at the right time, and getting the opportunity to show your stuff. So many great and talented people never get that opportunity.”
lead_paragraph: LIFE is all about being in the right place at the right time, and getting the opportunity to show your stuff. So many great and talented people never get that opportunity.

headline.main: A Mentor Is Not a Coddler
headline.print_headline: A Mentor Is Not a Coddler

byline.original: By ABHI TALWALKAR; As told to EVE TAHMINCIOGLU
